com.lef.scanner

接口 RangeNotifier


  • public interface RangeNotifier
    回调接口，需要实现回调接口中的方法，以接收扫描到的自定义的regionRegion中的beacon This interface is implemented by classes that receive iBeacon ranging notifications
    另请参阅:
    IBeaconManager.setRangeNotifier(RangeNotifier notifier), IBeaconManager.startRangingBeaconsInRegion(Region region), Region, IBeacon

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void didRangeBeaconsInRegion(java.util.Collection<IBeacon> iBeacons, Region region)
      按自定义的扫描周期回调显示所有扫描到的beacon Called once per second to give an estimate of the distance to visible iBeacons
      void onGoneBeacons(java.util.Collection<IBeacon> iBeacons, Region region)
      回调显示region中消失的beacon
      void onNewBeacons(java.util.Collection<IBeacon> iBeacons, Region region)
      回调显示region中新扫描到的beacon
      void onUpdateBeacon(java.util.Collection<IBeacon> iBeacons, Region region)
      回调更新region中beacon的信息

    • 方法详细资料

      • didRangeBeaconsInRegion

        void didRangeBeaconsInRegion(java.util.Collection<IBeacon> iBeacons,
                           Region region)
        按自定义的扫描周期回调显示所有扫描到的beacon Called once per second to give an estimate of the distance to visible iBeacons
        参数:
        iBeacons - a collection of IBeacon objects that have been seen in the past second
        region - the Region object that defines the criteria for the ranged iBeacons

      • onNewBeacons

        void onNewBeacons(java.util.Collection<IBeacon> iBeacons,
                Region region)
        回调显示region中新扫描到的beacon
        参数:
        iBeacons -
        region -

      • onGoneBeacons

        void onGoneBeacons(java.util.Collection<IBeacon> iBeacons,
                 Region region)
        回调显示region中消失的beacon
        参数:
        iBeacons -
        region -

      • onUpdateBeacon

        void onUpdateBeacon(java.util.Collection<IBeacon> iBeacons,
                  Region region)
        回调更新region中beacon的信息
        参数:
        iBeacons -
        region -
